price: By your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils, then We will surely bring them all around Hell on their knees[19].
arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَنَّهُمۡ وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحۡضِرَنَّهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيّٗا
footnotes: [19] i.e., out of terror they will be on their knees or dragged unwillingly while on their knees.
